description:
An e-bike friendly commuter helmet that helps keep you seen and safe. While cruising down bike lanes and braving traffic on your daily commute, the Dispatch wraps your head in comfortable protection. Equipped with both MIPS and Koroyd, this helmet has multiple layers of advanced protection. And, an integrated rear light shines like a beacon, so driver’s and other riders, can’t help but notice you.

  • Rechargeable LED rear light helps keep you seen and is easy pop out for charging
  • Koroyd® sections absorb more impact than traditional EPS alone
  • MIPS® helps with the reduction of rotational forces in the event of a crash
  • VaporFit™ dial adjustment system offers 270° fit adjustment for dialling in the perfect fit
  • Integrated headlamp strap clips are there for your sawn patrols and final runs
  • Fidlock® magnetic buckle is easy to do-up and undo, with one hand
  • AirEvac™ system pulls warm air away from your sunglasses for reduced fogging
  • 8 vents let you feel the wind in your hair
  • Ionic+™ antimicrobial lining keeps your helmet smelling fresh for longer
  • Includes a storage and transport bag to help keep your helmet looking great
name: Smith Dispatch MIPS Helmet - Unisex
